title: Królestwo kobiet
overview: Love, friendship, betrayal, crime and money! Four completely different women are connected by a perverse fate. Because of one man, they fall into the middle of a criminal intrigue. They have everything in common, but only when they start working together will they be able to face the world. The main roles are played by extraordinary actresses: Krystyna Janda, Gabriela Muskała, Karolina Gruszka and Aleksandra Adamska. "Królestwo kobiet" is a comedy in which the fair sex takes control. Former and current wife, lover and mysterious woman. Completely different, and connected by the "man of their lives", or rather his death. Instead of property, they inherit a company and debts to a local gangster! Four ordinary women looking for love, trying to control their lives, unknowingly get involved in the very center of criminal rackets. Although it's hard to like your ex-husband's new wife, let alone his lover, the girls quickly unite because only together they can't be defeated!
